    • resetInstance

      public void resetInstance()
      Description copied from interface: Resettable
      Allows any classes that use this interface to reset abilities, attributes, and/or items. The actual implementation of a reset happens in the tick or playTurn method of resettable instances. This method is executed in a reset manager later.
      Specified by:
      resetInstance in interface Resettable
